title: We Found Billie Eilish‚Äôs Viral Lip Stain - and It‚Äôs Only $12
description: Getty / WWD; Ulta. Every time I log into TikTok, I'm met with a new beauty product or hack that inevitably changes my life (and everyday look) for the better; a hidden hair-tie technique for a sleeker ponytail, a deodorant layering hack for all-day freshness, and most recently, a Billie Eilish-approved lip-stain trick that the star swears by for a plumper-looking pout - with video evidence to prove it. ICYMI: back in December of last year, the musician took to TikTok to give fans a glimpse of her concert makeup routine, where Eilish filmed herself getting ready for a show using a range of long-lasting beauty products, all designed to withstand even her sweatiest sets. There were the usual suspects - like a thick brow gel and a Maybelline eye liner that the star uses to create her signature, smoky eye look. But it's Eilish's lip regimen that's managed to garner the most attention online; her GRWM video now has more than 74 millions views and counting (casual). @billieeilish leave me alone i barely know what im doing but heres what works for me & what i do before every show on tour üíãüéÇüíåüéâüëØ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüéÑüôâ‚òïÔ∏è love you guys ‚ô¨ ilomilo - Billie Eilish In her TikTok video, Eilish focused on her lips for the final portion of her makeup routine, using the viral Sacheu Peel Off Lip Liner Stay-N ($12) to outline the edges of her pout before going back in with the Tower 28 OneLiner Lip Liner and Cheek Pencil ($15) to create a more exaggerated look. She then used a cotton pad to blot her lips, giving the illusion of a blurred, more muted coloring. The result was a fuller, plumper-looking pout that (presumably) lasts all night long; if the singer trusts this lip stain for a two-hour show, then you can definitely feel good using it in your everyday makeup routine or as a smudge-proof solution on your next date night. Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.

html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Every time I log into TikTok, I'm met with a new beauty product or hack that inevitably changes my life (and everyday look) for the better; a hidden hair-tie technique for a sleeker ponytail, a deodorant layering hack for all-day freshness, and most recently, a Billie Eilish-approved lip-stain trick that the star swears by for a plumper-looking pout ‚Äî with video evidence to prove it.

ICYMI: back in December of last year, the musician took to TikTok to give fans a glimpse of her concert makeup routine, where Eilish filmed herself getting ready for a show using a range of long-lasting beauty products, all designed to withstand even her sweatiest sets.

There were the usual suspects ‚Äî like a thick brow gel and a Maybelline eye liner that the star uses to create her signature, smoky eye look. But it's Eilish's lip regimen that's managed to garner the most attention online; her GRWM video now has more than 74 millions views and counting (casual).

In her TikTok video, Eilish focused on her lips for the final portion of her makeup routine, using the viral Sacheu Peel Off Lip Liner Stay-N ($12) to outline the edges of her pout before going back in with the Tower 28 OneLiner Lip Liner and Cheek Pencil ($15) to create a more exaggerated look. She then used a cotton pad to blot her lips, giving the illusion of a blurred, more muted coloring.

The result was a fuller, plumper-looking pout that (presumably) lasts all night long; if the singer trusts this lip stain for a two-hour show, then you can definitely feel good using it in your everyday makeup routine or as a smudge-proof solution on your next date night.

Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.
